title: The Erie Canal
brief_description: Based on the book by Peter Spier, the popular folk song about work and life on the Erie Canal is sung by Devin Terreson and brought to life with accurate and detailed illustrations.
description: Based on the book by Peter Spier, the popular folk song about work and life on the Erie Canal is sung by Devin Terreson and brought to life with accurate and detailed illustrations.
